issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
New type of YouTube ads is blocked by our filters. If that does not help, try using our script by following the instructions below.

---

Please enable AdGuard Extra in AdGuard settings (for app users).

---

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.title: Tracking domains
issue.body:
Hello!
There is a site called iplogger.com that allows you to create and insert a tracking pixel into any email (or even a website).

Here is a link to this service:
https://iplogger.org/tracking-pixel/

In the end, the links will look something like this:

```
iplogger[.]com/1V8mH4.jpg
iplogger[.]org/1V8mH4.jpg
iplogger[.]ru/1V8mH4.jpg
iplogger[.]co/1V8mH4.jpg
iplogger[.]info/1V8mH4.jpg
mapper[.]info/1V8mH4.jpg
2no[.]co/1V8mH4.jpg
yip[.]su/1V8mH4.jpg
iplogger[.]com/1V8mH4.jpg
ipgraber[.]ru/1V8mH4.jpg
ipgrabber[.]ru/1V8mH4.jpg
iplis[.]ru/1V8mH4.jpg
02ip[.]ru/1V8mH4.jpg
ezstat[.]ru/1V8mH4.jpg
wl[.]gl/1V8mH4.jpg
ed[.]tk/1V8mH4.jpg
bc[.]ax/1V8mH4.jpg
```

**So I suggest you the following rules:**
```
||iplogger.com^$third-party
||iplogger.org^$third-party
||iplogger.ru^$third-party
||iplogger.co^$third-party
||iplogger.info^$third-party
||mapper.info^$third-party
||2no.co^$third-party
||yip.su^$third-party
||iplogger.com^$third-party
||ipgraber.ru^$third-party
||ipgrabber.ru^$third-party
||iplis.ru^$third-party
||02ip.ru^$third-party
||ezstat.ru^$third-party
||wl.gl^$third-party
||ed.tk^$third-party
||bc.ax^$third-party
```

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: dzen.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.title: What did you developers do?
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

4.4.4

### What type of problem have you encountered?

AdGuard gets detected on a website

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://gaypornhdfree.com/?ref=mygaysites

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
Quick reminder if you want me to stop making issue tickets than stop not responding anymore on the ones already made again I am paying for AdGuard so I don’t understand why I have to make multiple issue tickets just to get a response now with that out of the way 

Okay, so I’m gonna try this way you all seem to be having no issue Alex, BlazDT, Zolyden,yougotskinny, and Krystian watching multiple videos on gaypornhdfree.com with your AdGuard active so clearly the issue is not with Adguard than it’s either with my phone, my internet provider, internet protocol, or I just didn’t follow the steps exactly and or in the correct order 

So please thoroughly explain the step by step process and the order of the process you did to accomplish Adguard never being detected when trying to play videos on gaypornhdfree.com

if I can determine with your help that I have now with confirmation followed the steps to the letter that you all followed to accomplish this,

than I can check this one off and realize it’s an issue with my phone, internet provider, or my internet protocol, 

but I want know unless one of you explains thoroughly what you did of step by step and the order to make gaypornhdfree.com never detect AdGuard each time, 


So please respond as asap with the detailed instructions of what you did 
2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
> Limit could be extended, but Op states he currently only has two lists active. iOS sadly treats iframe's requests as the main page, so every rule which targets iframe must be applied to main page too (for iOS)

I have deleted the three old user rules you wanted me to add, and I have now added the five new ones you just commented. I did them one by one, waited for the gray bar at the bottom of the app (rules are being converted, etc.) to disappear. I then went to the home menu of the app, and clicked the updating button. I did the same process for the other four. Some had updates, some didn't. For each one, the video was still broken.

issue.title: kledgeb.blogspot.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://kledgeb.blogspot.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fkledgeb.blogspot.com%2F) ### Comment > AdGuardを有効にすると「当サイトでの広告の表示を許可してください」というアンチアドブロック警告が表示されサイトが表示されません。AdGuard 迷惑要素フィルタを有効にすると警告は消えますが依然としてサイトは表示されません。 > > In case of using AdGuard, I get an anti‐adblockers "当サイトでの広告の表示を許可してください" and the site is not displayed. In case of activation of AdGuard Annoyances filter, the anti‐adblockers disappears, but the site is still not displayed. > ### Screenshots

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
